MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 postcode area of Flint, affecting properties in Albert Ave, Tir Digonedd and surrounding streets. We are aware of the previous power cuts and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site to investigate further the cause of the re-interruption. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.56am on 16th of January 2021
